[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Get Certified

Wood Therapy Certification

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

This procedure employs anatomically-sculpted wooden implements to improve the body’s size and proportions while advancing overall health. This therapy helps redefine body contours, reduce cellulite and facilitate weight loss.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Curriculum: Theory, Learning Each Element Of Wood, Lymphatic Drainage, Consultations, Different Target Conditions (Cellulite reduction, break down of adipose tissue, booty plump) Hands On Models, Business Marketing, Business Launching

 

We Cover Everything Needed To Get Started In The Industry

 

Included:

  • 6 pcs wood therapy set for body
  • Starter kit.

 

1 day course

 

Facial wood therapy kit available for purchase.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Tuition: $1350 + HST

 

Private or group classes available

 

$500 Deposit Required.

 

If you are interested in taking 1 or more classes please email us for combination training prices.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

NO REFUNDS OR TRANSFERS DEPOSITS UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE.

*** IMPORTANT: IF YOU FAIL TO ATTEND CLASS, TUITION WILL RESULT IN A LOSS AND NO REFUNDS WILL BE ISSUED. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
